author: Charif
text: You ever been so hungry you can’t think str8? I’m tryna figure out what ima eat for dinner rn

author: Charif
text: Not saying a healthy lifestyle will fix all your problems especially real disability; it probably will help you to fix them and not living healthily probably will hurt. An pills and therapy dont fix other peoples problems fr. Its what you do with it. Just my two cents

author: Charif
text: If I told you what they did then what they said. You would understand why I am the way I am

author: Charif
text: It is so selfish of me to ask for forgiveness, and not be able to forgive the people who did me wrong. Im atleast more understanding when people have a hard time forgiving me.

author: Charif
text: I have helped alot of people in my life. And Im grateful to God for being helped.

author: Charif
text: Love heals. Love fucking heals people. It even allows them to begin healing too like its a catalyst that sets off a ripple effect. Its a heart thing I cant deny that where I failed intellectually, my heart has its own consciousness that has led me intelligently

author: Charif
text: Help focus. Being dehydrated is a very common cause of undetected health issues- and beung hydrated helps promote health. Procrastinating on some shit affects focus. Alot of things affect focus memory etc. its a balance- and I think health  requires a wholistic perspective

author: Charif
text: In seeing now my rapid growth as well as me watching how memories and other things have kind of fallen into place after a certain point of recovery; I think I can say that balance has been key. If I dont eat, I cant focus. If I dont sleep, i cant focus. Exercise and good diet

author: Charif
text: In my journey with my health and watching my focus and other mental faculties deteriorate rapidly and then me having to build them up from the ground, slowly, painfully; I thought I had adhd and I was definitely depressed anxious fucked up mentally and emotionally

author: Charif
text: The phase im on love I wouldnt believe it either

author: Charif
text: I believe in cell regeneration in our ability to heal emotionally in our ability to strengthen our memory focus and our ability to learn and unlearn shit inspite of the difficulties and I believe in the newness of life. Ive seen too much unbelievable shit

author: Charif
text: Life isnt so black and white, simply fit in boxes all the time. Its more than that

author: Charif
text: I guess Im an enigma.tryna  paint pictures you could hear my guy

author: Charif
text: I think, the circle of yin and yang, of balance of life good bad etc, isnt 2d like a pie graph. Imo Its a fluid moving interconnected thing- its like water and the black and the white bleed into each other and mix and sometimes the lines arent clean. It just is

author: Charif
text: Tell they mf ass they need to hear 🤞🏽

author: Charif
text: I think Khalil Gibran is credited with the quote, but its sumn like “the obvious is only obvious when put simply”

author: Charif
text: Its a million ways to run a offense. Skin a cat. reach that goal. You dont gotta follow in their footsteps. And you dont gotta live your life like them, or the way you did yesterday 🤞🏽 individual growth can be a good thing

author: Charif
text: Going deep into my emotions and not running from what I was feeling has been more effective in helping push myself my relationships my craft my life forward more than going deep into my mind. Even though I think both are necessary

author: Charif
text: If you gon dish it out you gotta be able to take it

author: Charif
text: You ever feel that shit in your veins

author: Charif
text: Sometimes the answer is behind you, in your past. In the lessons learned, in your pain. Sometimes you gotta look back. Then bring it with you, and move forward. Or not lol

author: Charif
text: Woke up a sleeping giant

author: Charif
text: “Free your mind and everything will follow”  https://t.co/yPkusd5H1X

author: Charif
text: I think humble is all the times I let shit slide. Held back didnt speak my mind. Let the lies stick around like flies. I think humble is being like its cool its fine

author: Charif
text: Idk. Sometimes you gotta stand out from the crowd

author: Charif
text: When you not talking shit personally you can really see people For who they are

author: Charif
text: Don’t hate or kill the messenger. Cuz somebody else gon have the same message. The truth hurts. It will set you free

author: Charif
text: I really just have empathy compassion and understanding for people so rather than being vindictive I rather just help cuz I been there and it’s no shame in my game rn I feel dignified and I found my voice

author: Charif
text: Reality is malleable and relative And can change, even if someone and their perspective of it doesn’t

author: Charif
text: My ancestors were so much more in many different times and places. But perspective is important

author: Charif
text: Not trusting myself more than other people and being With people who didn’t really love themselves or me I wasn’t loving myself. Once I started, I found the love That was always there. And since then, life is so many things it wasn’t before. Its definitely new

author: Charif
text: Please appreciate your life. They say you ont know what you have until its gone. You can’t fathom what I’ve lost with severe brain Trauma… soooooo much more. And with what I have rn. Having love in my life and in my heart is my most valuable possession

author: Charif
text: Its ok to feel how you feel and me too. Ima just stand on shit and ask people, “well tell me why you feel the way you feel” or , ima just say prove it

author: Charif
text: I gotta clear my mind sometimes and I have saved so much for my art thinking about selling or having it be used to my advantage. Since I started giving freely I have so much more to give. You would never know by how cool calm n collected I am, until I’m not unless u really kno me

author: Charif
text: Getting to know people is a process and you gotta give them and yourself grace. And space and pace

author: Charif
text: Where the fuck was you at when I was sad down bad

author: Charif
text: Ima lift everybody up if I have to cuz I’m not going back

author: Charif
text: Shit still be happening. You gotta do shit for the free for the love. If not it’s going to hurt you. Someone said holding a grudge is like swallowing poison thinking its going to hurt the other person

author: Charif
text: I welcome criticism negative and constructive feedback opinion its the first amendment our people really had their fcking voices taken muzzled muted you better not shut up

author: Charif
text: I be seeing some shit. And I be inspired. And I have the answer. And I be like damn. Do i stfu or do I say something? But people took the time to fw me. And I’m not even selfish like that

author: Charif
text: Enslaved persons* I am high
